text: Khadzh sovershayetsya v izvestnyye mesyatsy. Kto namerevayetsya sovershit' khadzh v eti mesyatsy, tot ne dolzhen vstupat' v polovuyu blizost', sovershat' grekhi i vstupat' v spory vo vremya khadzha. Chto by vy ni sdelali dobrogo, Allakh znayet ob etom. Berite s soboy pripasy, no luchshim pripasom yavlyayetsya bogoboyaznennost'. Boytes' zhe Menya, o obladayushchiye razumom
